articles.description: Jimbo Fisher feels the best he has about the trajectory of Texas A&M's football program, and he's ready for the story to become what the Aggies do on the field and not his offseason spat with former boss Nick Saban.

articles.title: San Diego Padres' Blake Snell cleared to start day after DUI suspect hits car
articles.description: San Diego Padres lefty Blake Snell was cleared for his scheduled start Friday, one night after he was involved in a minor crash during a traffic stop.

articles.title: New York Yankees' Giancarlo Stanton poised to go on rehab assignment this weekend, Aaron Boone says
articles.description: Yankees slugger Giancarlo Stanton will work out before Friday's game, and if all goes well, will go on a rehab assignment with the Somerset Patriots on Saturday and Sunday, manager Aaron Boone told reporters Friday.
articles.content:

articles.description: Vanessa Bryant said she was "blindsided again, devasted, hurt" after learning that sheriff's deputies and firefighters had shared photos of Kobe and Gianna's bodies at the crash site.

articles.title: Quinn Ewers named starting quarterback for Texas Longhorns

articles.title: Top-ranked Iga Swiatek questions why US Open still uses different tennis balls for men and women
